Returns must not contain items that are: Returns must not contain items that are not included in the order
Quantities for returned items must not b: Quantities for returned items must not be greater than the sum between the quantities of registered products in the order and the quantities of products from other existing returns
The products array cannot contain multip: The products array cannot contain multiple instances of the same product
Returns cannot contain products that hav: Returns cannot contain products that have negative or null quantities
